table.name: time_tracker_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `time_tracker_settings` ( `selected_modules` text CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_estonian_ci NOT NULL, `field_settings` text CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_estonian_ci NOT NULL, `start_datetime_editable` int(3) DEFAULT NULL, `due_datetime_editable` int(3) DEFAULT NULL, `allow_create_comments` int(3) DEFAULT NULL, `auto_create_comments` int(3) DEFAULT NULL, `allow_bill_event_invoice` int(3) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: timetracker_data_log
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `timetracker_data_log` ( `userid` int(19) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `record` int(19) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `form_data` text, `status` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`userid`,`record`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_modules` ( `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL , `valid` int(1) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`module`));
